analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.dictionaryannotator.semantictagging.SemanticFieldAnnotator
analysisEngineMetaData.description: This Analysis Engine annotates English single words with semantic field information retrieved from an ExternalResource. This could be a lexical resource such as WordNet or a simple key-value map. The annotation is stored in the SemanticField annotation type.
analysisEngineMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010-2015 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: annotationType
configurationParameter.description: Annotation types which should be annotated with semantic fields

configurationParameter.name: constraint
configurationParameter.description: A constraint on the annotations that should be considered in form of a JXPath statement. Example: set #PARAM_ANNOTATION_TYPE to a NamedEntity type and set the #PARAM_CONSTRAINT to ".[value = 'LOCATION']" to annotate only tokens with semantic fields that are part of a location named entity.
